name: Caesar's World of Boxing
overview: Your sports fantasy comes true in the boxing arcade/strategy game that puts you in the ring at the fabulous Caesars Palace, Las Vegas. Behind the scenes, the managers, trainers, reporters, high-rollers and groupies who make up your entourage offer advice, encouragement and temptation. Under the lights, the world is watching as you tape the gloves, climb through ropes, and fight for the heavyweight crown.
